summary: Nottingham is a city in England's East Midlands, known for its links to Robin Hood and industries like lace-making and tobacco. It became a city in 1897 and has a population of over 300,000. Nottingham is a major sports hub, home to teams like Notts County and Nottingham Forest. It's also recognized as the "Home of English Sport" and a "City of Literature" due to its rich history and contemporary literary scene. The city has three universities and a well-connected transport system.
title: Nottingham
